amendment.description: Amendment provides for the inclusion of populations of neighborhoods surrounding at-risk ports in the ports security training program established in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 109-450 to provide for communities to be included in disaster awareness and preparation in the form of a "Neighborhood Watch.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
